description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, and we're adding the "Flightless bird" mini-game!
Hehehe, that girl is so cute.
Oh no! Someone help me!!
A voice cries out for help. Here comes the ocean hero, Penguin Jumper!!
The runway is clear. Now, time your leap just right. Straight to her!
name: Additional mini-game "Flightless bird"
